snippet.title: Grizzland (Black & White Metroidvania | Steam Trailer)
snippet.description:
Grizzland on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/603110
Grizzland on Consoles: https://www.eastasiasoft.com/games/Grizzland
Trailer by: Krealis ( https://www.youtube.com/user/ArtMissKiss/ )
Soundtrack by: Hyp3rsleep ( https://twitter.com/hyp3rsleep )
Thumbnail (Promo Art): https://www.artstation.com/karibo
